mapper.insert: insert into `pet-adoption`.want_adopt (account_id, pet_id, want_contacts_name, want_contacts_location, want_contacts_phone, want_contacts_email, want_contacts_wechat, want_text, want_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{accountId}, #{petId}, #{wantContactsName}, #{wantContactsLocation}, #{wantContactsPhone}, #{wantContactsEmail}, #{wantContactsWechat}, #{wantText}, #{wantStatus}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select * from `pet-adoption`.want_adopt join `pet-adoption`.pet p on want_adopt.pet_id = p.pet_id join `pet-adoption`.picture pic on p.picture_id = pic.pic_id where account_id = #{accountId} and want_adopt.is_delete = 0 and p.is_delete = 0

select * from `pet-adoption`.pet join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on pet.bulletin_id = b.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.want_adopt wa on pet.pet_id = wa.pet_id join `pet-adoption`.picture p on p.pic_id = pet.picture_id where b.account_id = #{accountId} and pet.is_delete = 0

select count(1) from `pet-adoption`.pet join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on pet.bulletin_id = b.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.want_adopt wa on pet.pet_id = wa.pet_id where b.account_id = #{accountId} and want_id = #{wantId} and want_status = 1 and wa.is_delete = 0
